alert.note: Alert for Orange (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 4:03PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Passaic, southeastern Orange and Rockland Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 402 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Florida, or over Goshen, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ringwood, Monroe, Warwick, Goshen, Sloatsburg, Chester, Greenwood Lake, Pomona, Florida, Harriman, Kiryas Joel, Mechanicstown, Thiells, Slate Hill and Hillburn. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
